channel.title: Wishing Well
channel.description: I have a wishing well on my server and when they use 50m on it they get a random item but the have to wait 1 hour. But if you log out log back in you can use the 50m on the well again and get a item. How do i change it so they cant use it if they log out and log back in?

item.title: Wishing Well
item.dc:creator: @allstar93 allstar93
item.description:
@allstar93 wrote:

I have a wishing well on my server and when they use 50m on it they get a random item but the have to wait 1 hour. But if you log out log back in you can use the 50m on the well again and get a item. How do i change it so they cant use it if they log out and log back in?
